title: Is there going to be a Harris Teeter in the Belle Meade Centre off Carolina Beach Road?
text:
Unfortunately we can't answer speculative questions about retail
development at MyReporter.com. If such a development is announced, it
will be reported in the StarNews and at StarNewsOnline.com.



Meanwhile, here's a link to the Belle Meade Centre site:
http://bellemeadenc.com/bellemeadeRetail.aspx
